description:
Welcome to Competitive Comparison Matrix: From Beginner to Expert!

No longer will you have to set a multi-hour meeting to painfully articulate the differences between products, services or companies! By creating a Competitive Comparison Matrix, you can document all of your comparative research and findings and provide those details professionally and intuitively in a single matrix to those that make the decisions.

I had been a Business Analyst for over two years, struggling in front of executives to explain why certain products were more beneficial than others. This all changed when I worked with a Senior Business Analyst on a project and they introduced me to the Competitive Comparison Matrix. This visual tool not only saved me time, but it also displayed my findings in a very professional manner. The meeting with top level executes was no longer about having to explain all of the details, but instead focused on making a decision and setting next steps.


All successful Business Analysts understand that in their position, the search for knowledge and techniques will never end. As that Senior Business Analyst did for me years ago, I now want to pass my knowledge, experience, and best practices on to you!


What bonuses are included in this course?

This course includes the Competitive Comparison Matrix template FREE! This template will allow you to be effective and efficient in creating definitive, rating, and weighted comparison matrices within your projects.


Why should you enroll?

You should enroll if you want to quickly learn the building blocks to visually compare products, services, or companies. Don't allow yourself to struggle, like I did, to explain findings without this tool.

As always, Jeremy, the instructor, is always available to help out - as if you were in a live course. So if you ever need something explained further, you will find an answer.

Get ready to put another skill specific tool in your toolbox!


What am I going to get from this course?

A step by step guide to compare and visually depict similar products, services, and companies.

  • Understand the differences between the definitive, rating, and weighted Competitive Comparison Matrices.
  • Save time and effort utilizing the pre-built template and produce a professional document you can confidently send to any level of management
  • Know-how to complete the provided Competitive Comparison Matrix template to increase the intuitiveness of your results, so you can focus on the team making a decision and setting next steps
title: Competitive Comparison Matrix for Business Analyst
